article: I was on my way home to Cincinnati from a business trip to New York,one day later than planned.My wife was admitted to _ that afternoon for surgery,and I was _ about getting back as soon as possible. I _ ,''I'll have only a few minutes to make my connecting _ .''"The airport bus won't be far away,''she said.
